English:
Can use the fixed ability: Nature

Unity: After the battle begins, for every three identical normal skills in the deck, they are decompiled and combined into one enhanced identical .fruit skill.
Chinese:
可以使用固定能力：自然

一体：
战斗开始后，牌库中每有三个同名的普通技能则会反编译并合成一张强化的同名.fruit技能。

English:
A young high school girl, she is very shy but observant. She wants to change and become more talkative but struggles to express her thoughts verbally.
Programming makes her feel safe and comfortable, and she quickly learned world-class programming skills.
Now she has joined Quantum led by QUEEN, following her to investigate the chaotic data streams of the Twisted Lands.
Chinese:
年轻的女高中生，她很害羞，但善于观察。她想改变，变得更加健谈，但一直与如何用言语表达思想作斗争。
编程让她感到安全舒适，她迅速学会了世界级的编程技巧。
现加入女王带领的量子，跟随女王调查扭曲之地的紊乱数据流。

English: When cast, draw an identical skill from the deck to your hand.
Chinese: 释放时，从抽牌堆中抽取一个同名技能加入手牌。

English: When cast, draw an identical skill from the deck to your hand.
Chinese: 释放时，从抽牌堆中抽取一个同名技能加入手牌。

English: When cast, select a .fruit skill from the discard pile to add to your hand, excluding Banana.fruit.
Chinese: 释放时，从弃牌堆中选一个.fruit加入手牌，香蕉.fruit除外。

English: When cast, select a non-Lucy skill from the discard pile to add to your hand, excluding Banana.fruit.
Chinese: 释放时，从弃牌堆中选一个非露西技能加入手牌，香蕉.fruit除外。

English: When cast, all identical skills in hand will be cast simultaneously.
Chinese: 释放时，手牌中所有此技能的同名技能将一同释放。

English: When cast, all identical skills in hand will be cast simultaneously.
Chinese: 释放时，手牌中所有此技能的同名技能将一同释放。

English: When this skill enters the discard pile, deal &a damage to all enemies. (30%)
Chinese: 此技能进入弃牌堆时，对所有敌人造成&a点伤害。（30%）

English: When this skill enters the discard pile, deal &a damage to all enemies. (60%)
Chinese: 此技能进入弃牌堆时，对所有敌人造成&a点伤害。（60%）

English: For each identical skill in hand, reduce this skill's mana cost by 1.
Chinese: 手牌中每有1个同名技能，该技能的法力值消耗-1。

English: For each identical skill in hand, reduce this skill's mana cost by 2.
Chinese: 手牌中每有1个同名技能，该技能的法力值消耗-2。

English:
Draw a skill.
Add an identical skill card to your hand, then draw an identical skill card (if none, do not draw). If a skill is drawn this way, shuffle this skill back into the deck.
Chinese:
抽取一个技能。
将一张目标技能的同名技能加入手牌，然后抽取一个该技能的同名技能（没有则不抽取），如果以此抽取了一个技能，则将本技能洗入抽牌堆。

English: Choose one of your exclusive skills from the discard pile, add all identical skills from the discard pile to the deck, then draw 1 skill.
Chinese: 选择弃牌堆中的1个自己的专属技能，将弃牌堆中所有与所选技能的同名技能加入抽牌堆，然后抽取1个技能。

English: Choose a skill in hand, discard the selected skill. Add its special effect to other .fruit skills in your hand.
Chinese: 选择手牌中的1个技能，丢弃被选中的技能。将其技能的特殊效果添加到手牌中的其他.fruit技能中。

English:
Draw a skill.
After the .fruit skill below this skill is cast, add an identical skill from the discard pile to your hand. Discard this skill after triggering the effect.
Chinese:
抽取一个技能
此技能下方的.fruit技能被释放后，从弃牌堆将一个与被释放技能的同名技能加入手牌中。触发此效果后丢弃这个技能。

English: When cast, choose 1 skill effect from 4 options to cast.
Chinese: 释放时，可以从4个技能选项中选择1个技能效果释放。

English:
Select one of your .fruit skills from the discard pile, add an identical skill to your hand.
For each identical skill in the discard pile, reduce overload by the corresponding amount.
Chinese:
选择弃牌堆中的1个自己的.fruit技能，将一个与所选技能的同名技能加入手牌中。
弃牌堆中每有一个与所选技能同名的技能，减少对应数量的过载。

English: Select one of your .fruit skills from the deck, add it to your hand.
Chinese: 选择抽牌堆中的1个自己的.fruit技能，将其加入手牌中。

English: Decompile all .fruit skills in your hand, draw skills based on the number of decompiled skills.
Chinese: 反编译手牌中所有的.fruit技能，根据反编译技能数抽取技能。

English: Select one of your .fruit skills from the deck, decompile all identical skills, and draw skills based on the number of decompiled skills.
Chinese: 选择抽牌堆中的1个自己的.fruit技能，反编译与所选技能的所有同名技能，根据反编译的技能数抽取技能。

English: After casting, select one of your .fruit skills from the discard pile, add all identical skills from the discard pile to your hand.
Chinese: 释放后，选择弃牌堆中的1个自己的.fruit技能，将弃牌堆中所有与所选技能的同名技能加入手牌中。

English: When cast, exclude all non-Lucy skills in hand costing 1 or less. For each skill excluded, increase this skill's damage by &a (45% attack power) in this battle.
Chinese: 释放时，放逐手牌中所有1费及以下的非露西技能，每放逐一个技能，此技能的伤害在本场战斗中增加&a(45%攻击力)

English: This skill is considered a .fruit skill.
At the start of battle, generate an identical skill considered a .fruit skill into the deck.
Chinese: 战斗开始时，在牌库生成一个视为.fruit技能的同名技能

English: When cast, add a Nature card to your hand. Ineffective when ESPER cannot battle.
Chinese: 释放时，将一张自然加入手牌。爱丝玻无法战斗时无效。

English: Remove the target skill from battle.
Chinese: 从战斗中移除目标技能。

English: This .fruit skill adds an identical skill to the deck at the start of battle.
Chinese: 这个.fruit技能会在战斗开始时将一个同名技能加入牌堆
